verses.kjv: Now these are the names of the tribes. From the north end to the coast of the way of Hethlon, as one goeth to Hamath, Hazarenan, the border of Damascus northward, to the coast of Hamath; for these are his sides east and west; a portion for Dan.
verses.web: “Now these are the names of the tribes: From the north end, beside the way of Hethlon to the entrance of Hamath, Hazar Enan at the border of Damascus, northward beside Hamath (and they shall have their sides east and west), Dan, one portion.
verses.ct: Here is how the land will be divided among the tribes. Starting at the northern boundary, Dan receives one portion. Its border runs along the road to Hethlon, through the entrance of Hamath, past Hazar Enan on the border of Damascus to the north, and along the edge of Hamath. This strip stretches from east to west.

verses.kjv: And by the border of Dan, from the east side unto the west side, a portion for Asher.
verses.web: “By the border of Dan, from the east side to the west side, Asher, one portion.
verses.ct: Next to Dan's border, stretching from east to west, Asher receives one portion.

verses.kjv: And by the border of Asher, from the east side even unto the west side, a portion for Naphtali.
verses.web: “By the border of Asher, from the east side even to the west side, Naphtali, one portion.
verses.ct: Next to Asher's border, stretching from east to west, Naphtali receives one portion.

verses.kjv: And by the border of Naphtali, from the east side unto the west side, a portion for Manasseh.
verses.web: “By the border of Naphtali, from the east side to the west side, Manasseh, one portion.
verses.ct: Next to Naphtali's border, stretching from east to west, Manasseh receives one portion.

verses.kjv: And by the border of Manasseh, from the east side unto the west side, a portion for Ephraim.
verses.web: “By the border of Manasseh, from the east side to the west side, Ephraim, one portion.
verses.ct: Next to Manasseh's border, stretching from east to west, Ephraim receives one portion.

verses.kjv: And by the border of Ephraim, from the east side even unto the west side, a portion for Reuben.
verses.web: “By the border of Ephraim, from the east side even to the west side, Reuben, one portion.
verses.ct: Next to Ephraim's border, stretching from east to west, Reuben receives one portion.

verses.kjv: And by the border of Reuben, from the east side unto the west side, a portion for Judah.
verses.web: “By the border of Reuben, from the east side to the west side, Judah, one portion.
verses.ct: Next to Reuben's border, stretching from east to west, Judah receives one portion.

verses.kjv: And by the border of Judah, from the east side unto the west side, shall be the offering which ye shall offer of five and twenty thousand reeds in breadth, and in length as one of the other parts, from the east side unto the west side: and the sanctuary shall be in the midst of it.
verses.web: “By the border of Judah, from the east side to the west side, shall be the offering which you shall offer, twenty-five thousand reeds in width, and in length as one of the portions, from the east side to the west side: and the sanctuary shall be in the middle of it.
verses.ct: Next to Judah's border, stretching from east to west, you must set apart a special section 25,000 reeds wide and as long as any tribal portion from east to west. This will be the sacred offering of land, and the sanctuary will stand at its center.

verses.kjv: The oblation that ye shall offer unto the LORD shall be of five and twenty thousand in length, and of ten thousand in breadth.
verses.web: “The offering that you shall offer to LORD shall be twenty-five thousand reeds in length, and ten thousand in width.
verses.ct: The portion you set apart for the LORD must be 25,000 reeds long and 10,000 reeds wide.

verses.kjv: And for them, even for the priests, shall be this holy oblation; toward the north five and twenty thousand in length, and toward the west ten thousand in breadth, and toward the east ten thousand in breadth, and toward the south five and twenty thousand in length: and the sanctuary of the LORD shall be in the midst thereof.
verses.web: For these, even for the priests, shall be the holy offering: toward the north twenty-five thousand in length, and toward the west ten thousand in width, and toward the east ten thousand in width, and toward the south twenty-five thousand in length: and the sanctuary of LORD shall be in the middle of it.
verses.ct: This sacred portion belongs to the priests. It measures 25,000 reeds on the north side, 10,000 reeds on the west, 10,000 reeds on the east, and 25,000 reeds on the south. The sanctuary of the LORD will stand right in the middle of it.

verses.kjv: It shall be for the priests that are sanctified of the sons of Zadok; which have kept my charge, which went not astray when the children of Israel went astray, as the Levites went astray.
verses.web: It shall be for the priests who are sanctified of the sons of Zadok, who have kept my instruction, who didn’t go astray when the children of Israel went astray, as the Levites went astray.
verses.ct: This land is for the consecrated priests descended from Zadok — the ones who faithfully carried out my instructions and didn't go astray when the rest of Israel and the other Levites wandered from me.

verses.kjv: And this oblation of the land that is offered shall be unto them a thing most holy by the border of the Levites.
verses.web: It shall be to them an offering from the offering of the land, a most holy thing, by the border of the Levites.
verses.ct: This portion of the land will be set apart as most holy for them, right next to the territory assigned to the Levites.

verses.kjv: And over against the border of the priests the Levites shall have five and twenty thousand in length, and ten thousand in breadth: all the length shall be five and twenty thousand, and the breadth ten thousand.
verses.web: “Answerable to the border of the priests, the Levites shall have twenty-five thousand in length, and ten thousand in width. All the length shall be twenty-five thousand, and the width ten thousand.
verses.ct: Alongside the priests' territory, the Levites will receive a strip 25,000 reeds long and 10,000 reeds wide — the full length being 25,000 and the full width 10,000.

verses.kjv: And they shall not sell of it, neither exchange, nor alienate the firstfruits of the land: for it is holy unto the LORD.
verses.web: They shall sell none of it, nor exchange it, nor shall the first fruits of the land be alienated; for it is holy to LORD.
verses.ct: They must never sell any of it, trade it away, or transfer this best part of the land to anyone else, because it is holy to the LORD.

verses.kjv: And the five thousand, that are left in the breadth over against the five and twenty thousand, shall be a profane place for the city, for dwelling, and for suburbs: and the city shall be in the midst thereof.
verses.web: “The five thousand that are left in the width, in front of the twenty-five thousand, shall be for common use, for the city, for dwelling and for pasture lands; and the city shall be in the middle of it.
verses.ct: The remaining strip, 5,000 reeds wide alongside the 25,000-reed section, is for common use — for the city itself, for homes, and for open pastureland. The city will sit in the center of it.

verses.kjv: And these shall be the measures thereof; the north side four thousand and five hundred, and the south side four thousand and five hundred, and on the east side four thousand and five hundred, and the west side four thousand and five hundred.
verses.web: These shall be its measurements: the north side four thousand and five hundred, and the south side four thousand and five hundred, and on the east side four thousand and five hundred, and the west side four thousand and five hundred.
verses.ct: Here are the city's dimensions: the north side will be 4,500 reeds, the south side 4,500 reeds, the east side 4,500 reeds, and the west side 4,500 reeds.

verses.kjv: And the suburbs of the city shall be toward the north two hundred and fifty, and toward the south two hundred and fifty, and toward the east two hundred and fifty, and toward the west two hundred and fifty.
verses.web: The city shall have pasture lands: toward the north two hundred fifty, and toward the south two hundred fifty, and toward the east two hundred fifty, and toward the west two hundred fifty.
verses.ct: The city will have open pastureland around it: 250 reeds to the north, 250 to the south, 250 to the east, and 250 to the west.

verses.kjv: And the residue in length over against the oblation of the holy portion shall be ten thousand eastward, and ten thousand westward: and it shall be over against the oblation of the holy portion; and the increase thereof shall be for food unto them that serve the city.
verses.web: The remainder in the length, alongside the holy offering, shall be ten thousand eastward, and ten thousand westward; and it shall be alongside the holy offering. Its increase shall be for food to those who labor in the city.
verses.ct: The remaining land alongside the sacred portion — 10,000 reeds to the east and 10,000 to the west — will produce food for the workers who serve the city.

verses.kjv: And they that serve the city shall serve it out of all the tribes of Israel.
verses.web: Those who labor in the city, out of all the tribes of Israel, shall cultivate it.
verses.ct: The workers who farm this land will come from all the tribes of Israel.

verses.kjv: All the oblation shall be five and twenty thousand by five and twenty thousand: ye shall offer the holy oblation foursquare, with the possession of the city.
verses.web: All the offering shall be a square of twenty-five thousand by twenty-five thousand. You shall offer it as a holy offering, with the possession of the city.
verses.ct: The entire sacred offering, including the city's land, will form a square measuring 25,000 by 25,000 reeds. You are to set apart this holy portion along with the property belonging to the city.

verses.kjv: And the residue shall be for the prince, on the one side and on the other of the holy oblation, and of the possession of the city, over against the five and twenty thousand of the oblation toward the east border, and westward over against the five and twenty thousand toward the west border, over against the portions for the prince: and it shall be the holy oblation; and the sanctuary of the house shall be in the midst thereof.
verses.web: “The remainder shall be for the prince, on the one side and on the other of the holy offering and of the possession of the city; in front of the twenty-five thousand of the offering toward the east border, and westward in front of the twenty-five thousand toward the west border, alongside the portions, it shall be for the prince. The holy offering and the sanctuary of the house shall be in the middle of it.
verses.ct: Everything left over on both sides of the sacred portion and the city property belongs to the prince. This land stretches east toward the eastern border and west toward the western border, running alongside the tribal portions. The sacred offering and the temple sanctuary will remain in the center of it all.

verses.kjv: Moreover from the possession of the Levites, and from the possession of the city, being in the midst of that which is the prince’s, between the border of Judah and the border of Benjamin, shall be for the prince.
verses.web: Moreover from the possession of the Levites, and from the possession of the city, being in the middle of that which is the prince’s, between the border of Judah and the border of Benjamin, shall be for the prince.
verses.ct: So the prince's land will surround the Levites' property and the city's property, filling the space between Judah's border to the north and Benjamin's border to the south.

verses.kjv: As for the rest of the tribes, from the east side unto the west side, Benjamin shall have a portion.
verses.web: “As for the rest of the tribes: from the east side to the west side, Benjamin, one portion.
verses.ct: Now for the remaining tribes south of the sacred portion: stretching from east to west, Benjamin receives one portion.

verses.kjv: And by the border of Benjamin, from the east side unto the west side, Simeon shall have a portion.
verses.web: “By the border of Benjamin, from the east side to the west side, Simeon, one portion.
verses.ct: Next to Benjamin's border, stretching from east to west, Simeon receives one portion.

verses.kjv: And by the border of Simeon, from the east side unto the west side, Issachar a portion.
verses.web: “By the border of Simeon, from the east side to the west side, Issachar, one portion.
verses.ct: Next to Simeon's border, stretching from east to west, Issachar receives one portion.

verses.kjv: And by the border of Issachar, from the east side unto the west side, Zebulun a portion.
verses.web: “By the border of Issachar, from the east side to the west side, Zebulun, one portion.
verses.ct: Next to Issachar's border, stretching from east to west, Zebulun receives one portion.

verses.kjv: And by the border of Zebulun, from the east side unto the west side, Gad a portion.
verses.web: “By the border of Zebulun, from the east side to the west side, Gad, one portion.
verses.ct: Next to Zebulun's border, stretching from east to west, Gad receives one portion.

verses.kjv: And by the border of Gad, at the south side southward, the border shall be even from Tamar unto the waters of strife in Kadesh, and to the river toward the great sea.
verses.web: “By the border of Gad, at the south side southward, the border shall be even from Tamar to the waters of Meribath Kadesh, to the brook, to the great sea.
verses.ct: Gad's southern border — the southernmost boundary of the entire land — runs from Tamar to the waters of Meribath Kadesh, then along the brook all the way to the Great Sea.

verses.kjv: This is the land which ye shall divide by lot unto the tribes of Israel for inheritance, and these are their portions, saith the Lord GOD.
verses.web: “This is the land which you shall divide by lot to the tribes of Israel for inheritance, and these are their several portions, says the Lord LORD.
verses.ct: "This is the land you are to divide by lot among the tribes of Israel as their inheritance, and these are their portions," declares the Lord GOD.

verses.kjv: And these are the goings out of the city on the north side, four thousand and five hundred measures.
verses.web: “These are the exits of the city: On the north side four thousand and five hundred reeds by measure;
verses.ct: Here are the exits of the city: the north side measures 4,500 reeds.

verses.kjv: And the gates of the city shall be after the names of the tribes of Israel: three gates northward; one gate of Reuben, one gate of Judah, one gate of Levi.
verses.web: and the gates of the city shall be named after the tribes of Israel, three gates northward: the gate of Reuben, one; the gate of Judah, one; the gate of Levi, one.
verses.ct: The city gates will be named after the tribes of Israel. On the north side there will be 3 gates: the gate of Reuben, the gate of Judah, and the gate of Levi.

verses.kjv: And at the east side four thousand and five hundred: and three gates; and one gate of Joseph, one gate of Benjamin, one gate of Dan.
verses.web: “At the east side four thousand and five hundred reeds, and three gates: even the gate of Joseph, one; the gate of Benjamin, one; the gate of Dan, one.
verses.ct: The east side measures 4,500 reeds and has 3 gates: the gate of Joseph, the gate of Benjamin, and the gate of Dan.

verses.kjv: And at the south side four thousand and five hundred measures: and three gates; one gate of Simeon, one gate of Issachar, one gate of Zebulun.
verses.web: “At the south side four thousand and five hundred reeds by measure, and three gates: the gate of Simeon, one; the gate of Issachar, one; the gate of Zebulun, one.
verses.ct: The south side measures 4,500 reeds and has 3 gates: the gate of Simeon, the gate of Issachar, and the gate of Zebulun.

verses.kjv: At the west side four thousand and five hundred, with their three gates; one gate of Gad, one gate of Asher, one gate of Naphtali.
verses.web: “At the west side four thousand and five hundred reeds, with their three gates: the gate of Gad, one; the gate of Asher, one; the gate of Naphtali, one.
verses.ct: The west side measures 4,500 reeds and has 3 gates: the gate of Gad, the gate of Asher, and the gate of Naphtali.

verses.kjv: It was round about eighteen thousand measures: and the name of the city from that day shall be, The LORD is there.
verses.web: “It shall be eighteen thousand reeds around: and the name of the city from that day shall be, ‘LORD is there.’
verses.ct: The total distance around the city will be 18,000 reeds. And from that day forward, the name of the city will be: The LORD Is There.
